Value

SpatialData

Examples

tf = tempfile()
dir.create(tf)
base = unzip_merfish_demo(tf)
#> returning path to cached zip
(x <- readSpatialData(base, tables=TRUE))
#> class: SpatialData
#> images(1): rasterized
#> labels(0):
#> shapes(2): anatomical cells
#> points(1): single_molecule
#> tables(1): table
